# group members
Claudio Gatica, Francisco Contreras,Marcos Arteaga, Aquiles Sepúlveda 

## General characteristics

Chilean hake (Merluccius gayi gayi) sustains an important fishery composed of two fleets, that is, the bottom-trawl industrial
fleet (large vessels) and the artisanal fleet (smaller vessels and boats). The hake present intermediate growth and mean longevity with a maximun age 17 years in females and 11 years in males. 

## Information available

There are official catch data and estimates of illegal catches between 1992-2020. Furthermore, abundance and biomass from survey in august (spawning period).

## Developed activities

a. Model costruction incorporating two fleets, catches, age-composition (fleets and survey) and biomass acoustic survey.
b. Structure data file to SS.
c. Structure control file-
d. Solve problems following examples, manual_SS, lectures and specially echoinput file.
e. Review different options to recruitment, include block to selectivity.
f. Generate output and summary to explore a first base model.
e. Review data weithing options.
g. Include bias correction SR.
f. Explore diagnostic options (i.e. retrospective analysis).
